title: You'll love our amazing community! Highly desirable neighborhood!
posting_body: ['Stonetree Apartments', '2414 Stone Rd', 'East Point, GA 30344', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '2 Bedroom | 2.5 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '1175', 'sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', 'Please call', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Unit Includes:', '● Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '● Carpeted Floor', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Central Air Conditioning and Efficient Gas Heat', '● Dishwasher', '● Fully-Equipped Eat-In Family Kitchens/Pantry', '● Oven', '● Range', '● Tub/Shower', '● Vinyl Flooring', '● Designer Mini Blinds', '● Fireplace in Select 2 Bedroom Units Only', '● Formal Dining Room', '● Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Linen Closets', '● Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '● Sunrooms and Private Patios in Select Apartments', '● Trash Compactor', '● Wet Bar', 'Property Description:', 'The large 1-, 2- & 3-bedroom apartments and townhomes at Stonetree deliver maximum space without the high price in a variety of floor plans.', "Discover the home you've been searching for at Stonetree Apartments, locally managed caring and professional on-site staff.", 'Property Amenities:', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● Business Center/Clubhouse', "● Children's Playground Area", '● Located in The Heart of East Point', '● Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '● On-Site Maintenance/Management', '● Package Service', '● Planned Social Activities', '● Resident Referral Program', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● City of Decatur "Award-Winning" Dining Just Minutes Away', '● Clothes Care Facility', '● Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center, Pool and Sundeck', '● Less than 15 Minutes from Downtown Atlanta', '● Minutes to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport', '● Monthly Pest Control', '● Northlake Mall and North DeKalb Mall Shopping', '● On Marta Bus Line.', 'Kensington and Indian Creek Rail Stations Nearby', '● Stone Mountain Park Close By', '● Total Electric - Gardens and Townhomes', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Proudly managed by Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '0BD8D83F7FF4421']
